definition: erhua variant of 調門|调门[diao4 men2]
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: A number of reviews took the same line.
sentences.chinese: 评论文章的调门儿都一样。

sentences.english: She has set the tune too low.
sentences.chinese: 她把调门儿起得太低了。
我唱不了那么高的调门儿。

definition: tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
pitch of voice (high or low)/pitch (of a musical note)/tone
to raise one's voice/to speak at the top of one's voice
see 頓挫抑揚|顿挫抑扬[dun4 cuo4 yi4 yang2]
(of singing or speaking) very articulate pronunciation and vocalizing
strange accent/odd manner of speaking or singing
